items.title: Thailand and Cambodia accuse each other of targeting civilians, as Trump urges calm
items.summary: Border clashes between the Southeast Asian countries have reignited, months after they signed a US-brokered ceasefire.

items.title: 'Profoundly distressing milestone': Indigenous deaths in custody highest in 45 years
items.summary: Grim figures reveal 33 Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people died in custody in 2024-25 — the highest number since 1980.

items.title: New jab for new COVID-19 variant: Australians can now access additional vaccine
items.summary: The federal health department says regular COVID-19 vaccinations are "the best way" to maintain protection.

items.title: Venezuela condemns 'blatant theft' after US seizes tanker and Trump pledges further action
items.summary: The seizure marks an escalation in tensions in the region, where a large US military presence has built up in recent weeks.

items.title: Porridge is a way of life in this Scottish town. An Australian helped capture it on film
items.summary: This tiny Scottish town is home to the World Porridge Making Championships. An Australian documentary has unearthed what it takes to be the best of the best.

items.title: US could ask Australian tourists to submit five years of social media history
items.summary: The proposal would expand existing Electronic System for Travel Authorisation requirements to include personal data spanning years.

items.title: From Calibri to Times New Roman: Why the US state department changed its font again
items.summary: The US state department started using Calibri, a modern sans-serif font that is more accessible for people with disabilities, during the Biden administration in January 2023.

items.title: Evidence reveals humans started fire-making 400,000 years ago after landmark UK find
items.summary: The discovery pushes back global fire-making timelines and suggests our ancestors transported materials, such as iron pyrite, to spark flames.

items.title: 'Impossible problem': The retirees who may need an extra $300k in super
items.summary: Some people will have to save 1.5 times more than others to have a 'dignified retirement', according to a new analysis

items.title: Australia’s teen social media ban: How day one unfolded — and the world’s response
items.summary: A year after clearing parliament, the teen social media ban finally took effect. But its debut was not without issues.

items.title: Crocodiles v humans: Safety crackdown could backfire, environmentalist says
items.summary: Expansions to crocodile removal zones and increased patrols are part of a plan to increase public safety.

items.title: The simple question at hospital that saved Stuart's life
items.summary: A new national report has found that Australians are facing an average five-year wait for life-saving medical technologies.

items.title: 'It won't be perfect': Albanese hails social media ban as it faces 'teething issues'
items.summary: Enforcement challenges emerge as the social media ban takes effect, while the eSafety boss compares it to gun reform and predicts others will follow.

items.title: At least two properties damaged as firefighters battle Tasmania bushfire
items.summary: Local residents have been evacuated, as a fire threatens several communities on the east coast.

items.title: Trump renews attacks on 'weak' Europe as he pressures Ukraine to hold wartime elections
items.summary: Donald Trump listed countries including Britain, France, Germany, Poland and Sweden that he said were being "destroyed" by migration.

items.title: Why are balloons from Belarus creating an 'emergency situation' in Lithuania?
items.summary: Lithuania has declared an emergency after high-altitude balloons disrupted hundreds of flights. What are they?

items.title: The global fault lines emerging over Australia's social media ban
items.summary: While Australia's world first under-16s social media ban is domestic in scope, its diplomatic implications appear to be far-reaching.

items.title: One of the best meteor showers peaks this weekend. Here's how to watch it from Australia
items.summary: Australia will enter a peak Geminids window this weekend as moonless skies promise one of the strongest meteor displays of the year.

items.title: Reserve Bank governor's warning about interest rates next year
items.summary: Major banks and economists broadly predicted the cash rate would remain at 3.6 per cent.

items.title: Australia's teen social media ban: Here are all the key details
items.summary: Platforms face up to $49.5 million in fines if they do not take "reasonable steps" to prevent under-16s from holding an account.

items.title: First Karen lost her mum. Then the fires came and burned all the memories
items.summary: Fires are burning across Tasmania and NSW, with dozens of homes destroyed and critical infrastructure damaged.

items.title: 'Frightening': UN human rights team blocked from NT prisons and youth detention centres
items.summary: A United Nations working group has been barred from accessing youth prisons, detention centres, and watch houses in the NT.

items.title: 'Profound shock': Family honours experienced firefighter killed in the line of duty
items.summary: The 59-year-old was helping lead the charge against the Bulahdelah fire when he was killed.

items.title: 'We say sorry': Victorian govt delivers historic apology to state's Indigenous people
items.summary: The apology comes after Victoria passed an Australian-first statewide treaty in October.
